name: Lost (itch) (RicardoRG)
description:
Sparky has been attacked and he lost his mask.

Play through four strange and dangerous worlds, helping sparky to found his mask!!  

Controls:

  • A and D: movement
  • Space: Jump
  • Mouse: Lamp

Easy true?
